Iced Out Cuban Link Chain Design: This is one of the most popular and trendy chain necklace.fashion design for hip hop lover,sturdy and simple,necklace chain made with 18k gold and silver plating.If you take a look at chain I guarantee diamond cuban link chain is part of your collection,and when you have it, they will put you in the spotlight on any occasion
PERFECT GIFT FOR HIM OR HER- For yourself or someone special, this timeless and versatile chain is the ideal gift for men and women with a cool sense of style. This is the perfect accessory for any outfit,suit for Party, Anniversary, Valentine Gift, Mother’s Day ,Father Day gift ,Christmas Gift ,Graduation gifts,friend gifts
What You Get:cuban necklace chain with box,friendly customer service. if you have any question please contact us we will respond within 24 business hours

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $17.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:52:55 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Water-resistant Compatible with Windows and Mac OS

104 keys US layout keyboard which can prevent damage from spilled drinks or coffee. The designed also keep your keyboard durable and waterproof.”

2-in-1 Keyboard for Gaming or Typing

A keyboard is a must-have tool for anyone who spends many hours typing to do office work every day. So backlit keyboards are designed for the gamer, office worker, copywriter, programmer, typing teacher, and editors.

Lock WIN key to enter game mode

Use FN + WIN keys to turn off the LED keyboard win key to enter the game mode, no longer need to worry about intense game touch win key pop-up start menu bar and lead to screen lag

Friendly Tips

1 Mechanical feel gaming keyboard is not a real mechanical keyboard, but the feel is similar to mechanical keyboard and less noise than mechanical keyboard, suitable for people who need office and game.If you need a real mechanical keyboard, please consider before ordering.

2. The LED of wired backlit keyboard has three colors: red, blue and purple. Press the backlight button to switch between single colors.Due to the differences between versions, if you receive a keyboard without backlit keys, you can use FN+Scroll Look to switch the backlight colour.

We advocate using a simple monochrome keyboard to help you improve your focus in office and gaming. If you need a rainbow breathing keyboard, please consider before ordering.

3.DBpower gaming keyboard product service: 12 months.

4.What’s inside the box? 1*DBpower mechanical feel gaming office 2-in-1 keyboard,1*User’s manual”

【3-Color RGB LED Backlight】Backlit keyboard have 3 Backlight modes providing you immersing gaming experience. Adjustable 23 level brightness meets different needs. You can customize your own backlit keyboard through adjusting the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit. Better enjoy the fun of the game.
【100% Anti-ghosting】Gaming Keyboard made of solid Metal Frame，No fading, more wear-resistant, avoiding the trouble of fading characters.104-key Gaming Keyboard, 19 Non-Conflict Keys, Removable Keycaps, Strengthened Space Key. Specially designed keys for enhanced durability and tactile feedback offers a professional gaming feeling，Give you a greater advantage in the competition.
【12 Function Hotkey Design】Mechanical keyboard features 12 easy-to-reach function keys for multimedia control of video and music, email, and more. Ideal for entertainment, teaching, and office, saving you time and making work and life easier. Convenient and worry-free .This keyboard suitable for families, offices, and travel.
【Ergonomic Design Keyboard 】The design of the pc keyboard accords with ergonomics, is not tired after long-term use, and provides you with the comfort needed for a marathon. The splash-proof feature prevents the internal components of the pc gaming keyboard from being damaged by accidental spills of coffee or water. Effectively prolong the service life, easy to clean.
【Sensitive&Wide Compatibility 】Wired Gaming Keyboard strokes are light and stress-free, and the rebound speed is fast .keyboard combination is very durable and compatible with Windows 2000 / ME / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10. The Wired Keyboard suitable for desktops, Chrome books, PCs, laptops, computers, smart TVs
